title: Drawing, "Cloudy Sky Near Sunset, Seen Over a Ridge", Recto: July 1844 and Verso: November 1844
inscribed:
Recto: Inscribed in graphite at right with the date.
Verso: Inscribed in graphite at top right with the date followed by:  I think that these clouds might / be used with advantage in a / sky half an hour or so before / sunset
description:
Recto: Vertical view of a group of trees in hill country.
Verso:  Cloudy sky over a ridge.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cloudy Sky Near Sunset, Seen Over a Ridge", Recto: July 1844 and Verso: November 1844.
Recto: July 1844 and Verso: November 1844. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-25.
